Name: maximize_total_story_points
Description: Maximize the sum of story points for all completed User Stories in a given period.

Name: minimize_project_budget_spent
Description: Minimize the total budget consumed by a project, aiming to stay under the allocated amount.

Name: maximize_priority_of_features
Description: Prioritize the completion of features with the highest priority values first.

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize the cumulative effort (e.g., in hours) for all tasks within a sprint or release.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the team's average velocity (story points per sprint).

Name: minimize_time_to_market
Description: Minimize the project's end date to deliver value to the market sooner.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_match
Description: Prioritize work that is relevant to stakeholders with the highest influence level.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity_sum
Description: Minimize the cumulative severity of all active blockers to reduce project risk.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status (e.g., a percentage) of sprint goals across all sprints.

Name: maximize_user_story_priority_value
Description: Focus on completing user stories that have the highest assigned priority.

Name: minimize_effort_for_epics
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort required to complete a set of epics.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction_in_retros
Description: Aim for higher team satisfaction scores as reported in sprint retrospectives.
